TCName.name: SalesHistoryFirstMonth
TCName.SalesHistoryTotal: select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_SLS_MPBU),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES_MPBU,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES_MPBU from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, wk b, loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no, c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no

TCName.name: PaidHoursHistoryFirsthMonth
TCName.PaidHoursHistoryTotal: select d.div_no,NVL(ROUND(((ROUND(((sum(d.ACTL_HRS_MPBU)*100)/25),0)*25)/100),2),0) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_HOURS_MPBU,0) as ACTL_HRS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_MPBU,ROUND(sum(actl_hrs),2) as ACTL_HOURS_MPBU from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and d.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.dept_no!=20 group by b.div_no,b.rgn_no order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no

TCName.name: CPHFirsthMonth
TCName.CPHHistoryTotal: select V.div_no,ROUND((V.ACTL_WGE_TOT_MPBU / V.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPBU),2) as ACTL_CPH_TOT_MPBU from (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_WGE_MPBU),0) as ACTL_WGE_TOT_MPBU,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_HRS_MPBU),2) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MPBU,0) as ACTL_WGE_MPBU,NVL(U.ACTL_HOURS_MPBU,0) as ACTL_HRS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_MPBU,ROUND(sum(actl_hrs),2) as ACTL_HOURS_MPBU from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and d.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.dept_no!=20 group by b.div_no,b.rgn_no order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) V order by V.div_no

TCName.CPHHistoryTotal: select V.div_no,ROUND((V.ACTL_WGE_TOT_MPBU / V.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPBU),2) as ACTL_CPH_TOT_MPBU from (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_WGE_MPBU),0) as ACTL_WGE_TOT_MPBU,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_HRS_MPBU),2) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MPBU,0) as ACTL_WGE_MPBU,NVL(U.ACTL_HOURS_MPBU,0) as ACTL_HRS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_MPBU,ROUND(sum(actl_hrs),2) as ACTL_HOURS_MPBU from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and d.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.dept_no!=20 group by b.div_no,b.rgn_no order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) V order by V.div_no

TCName.CPHHistoryTotal: select V.div_no,ROUND((V.ACTL_WGE_TOT_MPBU / V.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPBU),2) as ACTL_CPH_TOT_MPBU from (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_WGE_MPBU),0) as ACTL_WGE_TOT_MPBU,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_HRS_MPBU),2) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MPBU,0) as ACTL_WGE_MPBU,NVL(U.ACTL_HOURS_MPBU,0) as ACTL_HRS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_MPBU,ROUND(sum(actl_hrs),2) as ACTL_HOURS_MPBU from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and d.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.dept_no!=20 group by b.div_no,b.rgn_no order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) V order by V.div_no

TCName.name: WagePercentageHistoryFirsthMonth
TCName.WagePercentageHistoryTotal: select actl_wge.div_no,ROUND((actl_wge.ACTL_WGE_TOT_MPBU / actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPBU)*100,2) as ACTL_WGE_PRCNT_TOT_MPBU from (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum (d.ACTL_WGE_MPBU),0) as ACTL_WGE_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MPBU,0) as ACTL_WGE_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_MPBU,ROUND(sum(actl_hrs),0) as ACTL_HRS_MPBU from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and d.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.dept_no! =20 group by b.div_no,b.rgn_no order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) actl_wge, (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_SLS_MPBU),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES_MPBU,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(a.actl_sls),0) as ACTL_SALES_MPBU from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, wk b, loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no, c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) actl_sls where actl_wge.div_no=actl_sls.div_no order by actl_wge.div_no

TCName.name: ItemPriceHistoryFirsthMonth
TCName.ItemPriceHistoryTotal: select x.div_no,ROUND((x.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPBU / x.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPBU),2) as ACTL_ITM_PRZ_TOT_MPBU from (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_SLS_MPBU),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPBU,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_ITM_MPBU),0) as ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES_MPBU,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPBU,NVL(U.ACTL_ITEMS_MPBU,0) as ACTL_ITM_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES_MPBU,ROUND(sum(a.actl_itm_cnt),0) as ACTL_ITEMS_MPBU from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, wk b, loc c where a. TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) x order by x.div_no

TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) x order by x.div_no

TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) x order by x.div_no

TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('Month') and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) x order by x.div_no

TCName.name: BudgetSales_CurrentMonth
TCName.BudgetSalesTotal: select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.BDGT_SLS_MPBU),0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.BDGT_SALES_MPBU,0) as BDGT_SLS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,sum(a.bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES_MPBU from ww_wlp.wky_bdgt a, wk b, loc c where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no
TCName.ForecastSalesTotal: select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.FCST_SLS_MPBU),0) as FCST_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.FCST_SALES_MPBU,0) as FCST_SLS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,sum(a.frcst_sls) as FCST_SALES_MPBU from ww_wlp.mnth_fcst a, wk b, loc c where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no

TCName.name: PlannedSales_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedSalesTotal: select f.div_no,NVL(sum(e.PLN_SLS_MPBU),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by rgn_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,sum(d.MGR_WKY_SLS) as PLN_SLS_MPBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no, c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_SLS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id= b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no) UNION select * from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(d.GEN_SLS_MPS), 0) as GEN_SALES_MPBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no,ROUND(sum(a.gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SLS_MPS from fcst a, wk b, loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no= a.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no) d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no)) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no

TCName.name: GeneratedSales_CurrentMonth
TCName.GeneratedSalesTotal: select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.GEN_SLS_MPBU),0) as GEN_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.GEN_SALES_MPBU,0) as GEN_SLS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,sum(d.GEN_SLS_MPS) as GEN_SALES_MPBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no,ROUND(sum(a.gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SLS_MPS from fcst a, wk b, loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no=a.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no order by c.div_no,c. rgn_no,c.loc_no) d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no

TCName.name: BudgetWages_CurrentMonth
TCName.BudgetWagesTotal: select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.BDGT_WGE_MPBU),0) as BDGT_WGE_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.BDGT_WAGE_MPBU,0) as BDGT_WGE_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,sum(a.bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE_MPBU from ww_wlp.wky_bdgt a, wk b, loc c where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no= c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no
TCName.ForecastWagesTotal: select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.FCST_WGE_MPBU),0) as FCST_WGE_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.FCST_WAGE_MPBU,0) as FCST_WGE_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,sum(a.frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE_MPBU from ww_wlp.mnth_fcst a, wk b, loc c where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no

TCName.name: BaseCostWages_CurrentMonth
TCName.BaseCostTotal: select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.BASE_COST_MPBU),0) as BASE_COST_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.BASE_COST_MPBU,0) as BASE_COST_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,sum(e.base_cost_dept) as base_cost_mpbu from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_no,d.dept_no,(d.wge+d.wge_adj) as base_cost_dept from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no, a.dept_no,nvl(TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,0) as wge,nvl(WAGE_ADJ_AMT,0) as wge_adj from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no= c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no) d) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no

TCName.name: PlannedWages_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedWagesTotal: select f.div_no,NVL(sum(e.PLN_WGE_MPBU),0) as PLN_WGE_TOT_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by rgn_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) as PLN_WGE_MPBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no, c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no) UNION select * from (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,ROUND(sum( e.base_wage_dept),0) as BASE_WAGE_MPBU from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_no,d.dept_no,(d.wge+d.wge_adj) as base_wage_dept from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,nvl(TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,0) as wge,nvl(WAGE_ADJ_AMT,0) as wge_adj from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no) d) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no)) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no

TCName.name: BudgetWagesPercentage_CurrentMonth
TCName.BudgetWagesPercentageTotal: select bdgt_wge.div_no,ROUND((bdgt_wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_MPBU / bdgt_sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPBU)*100,2) as BDGT_WGE_PRCNT_TOT_MPBU from (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum (d.BDGT_WGE_MPBU),0) as BDGT_WGE_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.BDGT_WAGE_MPBU,0) as BDGT_WGE_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,sum(a.bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE_MPBU from ww_wlp.wky_bdgt a, wk b, loc c where a.wk_id= b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no, c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) bdgt_wge,(select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.BDGT_SLS_MPBU),0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.BDGT_SALES_MPBU,0) as BDGT_SLS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(a.bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SALES_MPBU from ww_wlp.wky_bdgt a, wk b, loc c where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) bdgt_sls where bdgt_wge.div_no=bdgt_sls.div_no order by bdgt_wge.div_no
TCName.ForecastWagesPercentageTotal: select bdgt_wge.div_no,ROUND((bdgt_wge.FCST_WGE_TOT_MPBU / bdgt_sls.FCST_SLS_TOT_MPBU)*100,2) as FCST_WGE_PRCNT_TOT_MPBU from (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d. FCST_WGE_MPBU),0) as FCST_WGE_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.FCST_WAGE_MPBU,0) as FCST_WGE_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,sum(a.frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE_MPBU from ww_wlp.mnth_fcst a, wk b, loc c where a.wk_id=b. wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c. rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) bdgt_wge,(select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.FCST_SLS_MPBU),0) as FCST_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.FCST_SALES_MPBU,0) as FCST_SLS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(a.frcst_sls),0) as FCST_SALES_MPBU from ww_wlp.mnth_fcst a, wk b, loc c where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) bdgt_sls where bdgt_wge.div_no=bdgt_sls.div_no order by bdgt_wge.div_no

TCName.name: PlannedWagesPercentage_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedWagesPercentageTotal: select pln_wge.div_no,ROUND((pln_wge.PLN_WGE_TOT_MPBU / pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_MPBU)*100,2) as PLN_WGE_PRCNT_TOT_MPBU from (select f.div_no,NVL(sum(e.PLN_WGE_MPBU) ,0) as PLN_WGE_TOT_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by rgn_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,sum (d.MGR_WKY_WGE) as PLN_WGE_MPBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no) UNION select * from (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(e.base_wage_dept),0) as BASE_WAGE_MPBU from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_no,d.dept_no,(d.wge+d.wge_adj) as base_wage_dept from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no, nvl(TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,0) as wge,nvl(WAGE_ADJ_AMT,0) as wge_adj from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no) d) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no)) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) pln_wge,(select f.div_no,NVL(sum(e.PLN_SLS_MPBU),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' order by rgn_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,ROUND(sum (d.MGR_WKY_SLS),0) as PLN_SLS_MPBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_SLS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no) UNION select * from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(d.GEN_SLS_MPS),0) as GEN_SALES_MPBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no,ROUND(sum(a.gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SLS_MPS from fcst a, wk b, loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no=a.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no) d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no)) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) pln_sls where pln_wge.div_no=pln_sls.div_no order by pln_wge.div_no

TCName.name: SMSHours_CurrentMonth
TCName.SMSHoursTotal: select d.div_no,NVL(ROUND(((ROUND(((sum(d.SMS_HRS_MPBU)*100)/25),0)*25)/100),2),0) as SMS_HRS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.SMS_HOURS_MPBU,0) as SMS_HRS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,(sum(nvl(a.vol_hrs,0)) + sum(nvl(a.fix_hrs,0))) as SMS_HOURS_MPBU from ww_wlp.wky_lbr_std a, wk b, loc c, task d where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.task_no=d.task_no and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no

TCName.name: BaseHours_CurrentMonth
TCName.BasehoursTotal: select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.BASE_HRS_MPBU),0) as BASE_HRS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.BASE_HOURS_MPBU,0) as BASE_HRS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,sum(e.base_hours_dept) as BASE_HOURS_MPBU from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_no,d.dept_no,(d.hrs+d.hrs_adj) as base_hours_dept from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no, a.dept_no,nvl(TA_PLN_HRS,0) as hrs,nvl(WAGE_ADJ_HRS,0) as hrs_adj from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no) d) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no

TCName.name: PlannedHours_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedHoursTotal: select f.div_no,NVL(sum(e.PLN_HOURS_MPBU),0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by rgn_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,sum(d.MGR_WKY_HRS) as PLN_HOURS_MPBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_HRS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b. perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no) UNION select * from (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(e.base_hours_dept),0) as BASE_HOURS_MPBU from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_no,d.dept_no,(d.hrs+d.hrs_adj) as base_hours_dept from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no, c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,nvl(TA_PLN_HRS,0) as hrs,nvl(WAGE_ADJ_HRS,0) as hrs_adj from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no, a.dept_no) d) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no)) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no

TCName.name: VarToBUDSales_CurrentMonth
TCName.VartoBUDTotal: select pln_sls.div_no,(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_MPBU - bdgt_sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPBU) as VAR_TO_BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select f.div_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(e.PLN_SLS_MPBU),0),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by rgn_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no, sum(d.MGR_WKY_SLS) as PLN_SLS_MPBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_SLS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no) UNION select * from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,sum(d.GEN_SLS_MPS) as GEN_SALES_MPBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no,ROUND(sum(a.gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SLS_MPS from fcst a, wk b, loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no=a.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no order by c.div_no, c.rgn_no,c.loc_no) d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no)) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) pln_sls, (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.BDGT_SLS_MPBU),0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.BDGT_SALES_MPBU,0) as BDGT_SLS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,sum(a.bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES_MPBU from ww_wlp.wky_bdgt a, wk b, loc c where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) bdgt_sls where pln_sls.div_no=bdgt_sls.div_no order by pln_sls.div_no
TCName.VartoFCSTTotal: select pln_sls.div_no,(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_MPBU - fcst_sls.FCST_SLS_TOT_MPBU) as VAR_TO_FCST_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select f.div_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(e.PLN_SLS_MPBU),0),0) as select * from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,sum(d.GEN_SLS_MPS) as GEN_SALES_MPBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no,ROUND(sum(a.gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SLS_MPS from fcst a, wk b, loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no=a.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no) d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no)) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) pln_sls,(select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.FCST_SLS_MPBU),0) as FCST_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.FCST_SALES_MPBU,0) as FCST_SLS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,sum(a.frcst_sls) as FCST_SALES_MPBU from ww_wlp.mnth_fcst a, wk b, loc c where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) fcst_sls where pln_sls.div_no=fcst_sls.div_no order by pln_sls.div_no

a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no=a.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no) d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no)) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) pln_sls_cy, (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_SLS_MPBU),0) as ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES_MPBU,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('LYMnth') and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) actl_sls_ly where pln_sls_cy.div_no=actl_sls_ly.div_no order by pln_sls_cy.div_no

TCName.name: LYPercentageWages_CurrentMonth
TCName.LYPercentageWagesTotal: Select pln_wge_cy.div_no,ROUND(((pln_wge_cy.PLN_WAGE_CY_TOT_MPBU / actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_MPBU)-1)*100,2) as LY_PRCNT_WAGE_TOT_MPBU from (select f.div_no,NVL(sum(e.PLN_WGE_MPBU),0) as PLN_WAGE_CY_TOT_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by rgn_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) as PLN_WGE_MPBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc, a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no) UNION select * from (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(e.base_wage_dept),0) as BASE_WAGE_MPBU from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_no,d.dept_no,(d.wge+d.wge_adj) as base_wage_dept from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no, a.loc_no,a.dept_no,nvl(TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,0) as wge,nvl(WAGE_ADJ_AMT,0) as wge_adj from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no) d) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no)) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) pln_wge_cy,(select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_WGE_MPBU),0) as ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MPBU,0) as ACTL_WGE_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_MPBU, ROUND(sum(actl_hrs),0) as ACTL_HRS_MPBU from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and d.perd_desc in ('LYMnth') and a.dept_no!=20 group by b.div_no,b.rgn_no order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) actl_wge_ly where pln_wge_cy.div_no=actl_wge_ly.div_no order by pln_wge_cy.div_no

hrs,nvl(WAGE_ADJ_HRS,0) as hrs_adj from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) */ order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no) d) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no)) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(actl_wage_amt),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPBU,ROUND(sum(actl_hrs),2) as ACTL_HOURS_MPBU from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and d.perd_desc in ('LYMnth') and a.dept_no!=20 group by b.div_no,b.rgn_no order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) actl_hrs_ly where pln_hrs_cy.div_no=actl_hrs_ly.div_no order by pln_hrs_cy.div_no

TCName.name: PlannedOR_CurrentMonth

SMS_HRS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.SMS_HOURS_MPBU,0) as SMS_HRS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,(sum(nvl(a.vol_hrs,0)) + sum(nvl(a.fix_hrs,0))) as SMS_HOURS_MPBU from ww_wlp.wky_lbr_std a, wk b, loc c, task d where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.task_no=d.task_no and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) sms_hrs,(select f.div_no,NVL(sum(e.PLN_HOURS_MPBU),0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' order by rgn_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no, ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_HRS),0) as PLN_HOURS_MPBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_HRS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no) UNION select * from (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(e.base_hours_dept),0) as BASE_HOURS_MPBU from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_no,d.dept_no,(d.hrs+d.hrs_adj) as base_hours_dept from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no, nvl(TA_PLN_HRS,0) as hrs,nvl(WAGE_ADJ_HRS,0) as hrs_adj from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no) d) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no)) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) pln_hrs where sms_hrs.div_no=pln_hrs.div_no order by sms_hrs.div_no

e.div_no,e.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(e.base_wage_dept),0) as BASE_WAGE_MPBU from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_no,d.dept_no,(d.wge+d.wge_adj) as base_wage_dept from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no, nvl(TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,0) as wge,nvl(WAGE_ADJ_AMT,0) as wge_adj from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no) d) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no)) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) pln_wge,(select f.div_no,NVL(sum(e.PLN_HOURS_MPBU),0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' order by rgn_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no, ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_HRS),0) as PLN_HOURS_MPBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_HRS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no) UNION select * from (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(e.base_hours_dept),0) as BASE_HOURS_MPBU from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_no,d.dept_no,(d.hrs+d.hrs_adj) as base_hours_dept from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no, a.dept_no,nvl(TA_PLN_HRS,0) as hrs,nvl(WAGE_ADJ_HRS,0) as hrs_adj from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no) d) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no)) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) pln_hrs where pln_wge.div_no=pln_hrs.div_no order by pln_wge.div_no

TCName.name: GrowthLYCPH_CurrentMonth

pln_wge.div_no,ROUND((pln_wge.PLN_WAGE_TOT_MPBU / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_MPBU),2) as PLN_CPH_CY_TOT_MPBU from (select f.div_no,NVL(sum(e.PLN_WGE_MPBU),0) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by rgn_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no, sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) as PLN_WGE_MPBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no) UNION select * from (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(e.base_wage_dept),0) as BASE_WAGE_MPBU from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_no,d.dept_no,(d.wge+d.wge_adj) as base_wage_dept from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no, nvl(TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,0) as wge,nvl(WAGE_ADJ_AMT,0) as wge_adj from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no) d) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no)) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) pln_wge,(select f.div_no,NVL(sum(e.PLN_HOURS_MPBU),0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' order by rgn_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no, ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_HRS),0) as PLN_HOURS_MPBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_HRS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no) UNION select * from (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(e.base_hours_dept),0) as BASE_HOURS_MPBU from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_no,d.dept_no,(d.hrs+d.hrs_adj) as base_hours_dept from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no, nvl(TA_PLN_HRS,0) as hrs,nvl(WAGE_ADJ_HRS,0) as hrs_adj from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no) d) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no)) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) pln_hrs where pln_wge.div_no=pln_hrs.div_no order by pln_wge.div_no) pln_cph_cy,(select V.div_no,ROUND((V.ACTL_WGE_TOT_MPBU / V.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPBU),2) as ACTL_CPH_LY_TOT_MPBU from (select d.div_no, ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_WGE_MPBU),0) as ACTL_WGE_TOT_MPBU,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_HRS_MPBU),2) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MPBU,0) as ACTL_WGE_MPBU, NVL(U.ACTL_HOURS_MPBU,0) as ACTL_HRS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(actl_wage_amt),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPBU,ROUND(sum(actl_hrs),2) as ACTL_HOURS_MPBU from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and d.perd_desc in ('LYMnth') and a.dept_no!=20 group by b.div_no,b.rgn_no order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) V order by V.div_no) actl_cph_ly where pln_cph_cy.div_no=actl_cph_ly.div_no order by pln_cph_cy.div_no

TCName.name: BGDT_FCST_OR_CurrentMonth
TCName.BudgetORTotal: select x.div_no, case when NVL(x.BDGT_SMS_TOT_MPWG,0)=0 and NVL(x.BDGT_HRS_TOT_MPWG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.BDGT_SMS_TOT_MPWG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.BDGT_HRS_TOT_MPWG,0)=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((x.BDGT_SMS_TOT_MPWG / x.BDGT_HRS_TOT_MPWG) * 100,2),0) end as BDGT_OR_TOT_MPWG from (select f.div_no,sum(g.BDGT_SMS_WPR) as BDGT_SMS_TOT_MPWG,sum(g.BDGT_HRS_WPR) as BDGT_HRS_TOT_MPWG from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.div_no,C.rgn_no,sum(bdgt_sms_hrs) as BDGT_SMS_WPR,sum(bdgt_hrs) as BDGT_HRS_WPR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,nvl(bdgt_sms_hrs,0) as bdgt_sms_hrs, nvl(bdgt_hrs,0) as bdgt_hrs from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.div_no,C.rgn_no order by C.div_no,C.rgn_no) g on f.div_no=g.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) x order by x.div_no
TCName.ForecastORTotal: select sms_hrs.div_no, case when NVL(sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_TOT_MPWG,0)=0 and NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_MPWG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_TOT_MPWG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_MPWG,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_TOT_MPWG / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_MPWG)*100,2) end as PLN_OR_TOT_MPWG from (select d.div_no,NVL(SUM(ROUND(((ROUND(((d.SMS_HRS_MPWG*100)/25),2)*25)/100),2)),0) as SMS_HRS_TOT_MPWG from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.SMS_HOURS_MPWG,0) as SMS_HRS_MPWG from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND((sum(nvl(a.vol_hrs,0)) + sum(nvl(a.fix_hrs,0))),2) as SMS_HOURS_MPWG from ww_wlp.wky_lbr_std a, wk b, loc c, task d where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.task_no=d.task_no and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) sms_hrs, (select f.div_no,NVL(SUM(ROUND(((ROUND(((e.PLN_HOURS_MPWG*100)/25),2)*25)/100),2)),0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_MPWG from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' order by rgn_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(e.plan_paid_hours),2) as PLN_HOURS_MPWG from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_no,d.dept_no,d.plan_paid_hours from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no, nvl(a.plan_paid_hours,0) as plan_paid_hours from ww_wlp.mnth_fcst a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no) d) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) pln_hrs where sms_hrs.div_no=pln_hrs.div_no order by sms_hrs.div_no

TCName.name: PlannedBDGTRateandFCSTRateCurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedBudgetRate:
select rslt.div_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(rslt.OVERSPENT_BDGT_RATE_MPS),0),0) as OVERSPENT_BDGT_RATE_MPWG from (select src.div_no,src.rgn_no,src.zone_no,src.ar_no,src.loc_nm,src.wk_id, case when src.PLN_SLS_MPS > src.BDGT_SLS_MPS then NVL(ROUND((src.PLN_WGE_MPS - ((((src.PST_FACTOR_MPS * (src.BDGT_WGE_PCT_MPS/100)) * (src.PLN_SLS_MPS - src.BDGT_SLS_MPS)) + src.BDGT_WGE_MPS))),0),0) When src.PLN_SLS_MPS < src.BDGT_SLS_MPS then NVL(ROUND((src.PLN_WGE_MPS - ((((src.NGT_FACTOR_MPS * (src.BDGT_WGE_PCT_MPS/100)) * (src.PLN_SLS_MPS - src.BDGT_SLS_MPS)) + src.BDGT_WGE_MPS))),0),0) else NVL(ROUND((src.PLN_WGE_MPS - src.BDGT_WGE_MPS),0),0) end as OVERSPENT_BDGT_RATE_MPS from
(select a.div_no,a.rgn_no,a.zone_no,a.ar_no,a.loc_nm,a.wk_id, a.PLN_WGE_MPS,b.pst_factor_MPS,b.ngt_factor_MPS,c.bdgt_wge_pct_MPS,d.PLN_SLS_MPS,c.BDGT_WGE_MPS,C.BDGT_SLS_MPS from
(select lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,lc.loc_nm,pln_wge.wk_id,pln_wge.PLN_WGE_MPS from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_nm from loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_nm) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,f.wk_id,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR,0) as PLN_WGE_MPS from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_nm,d.wk_id,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' ) and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_nm,d.wk_id order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_nm,d.wk_id) UNION select * from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_nm,d.wk_id,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' ) and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' ) and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_nm,d.wk_id order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_nm,d.wk_id)) e on e.wk_id=f.wk_id order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,f.wk_id) pln_wge on lc.div_no=pln_wge.div_no and lc.rgn_no=pln_wge.rgn_no and lc.zone_no=pln_wge.zone_no and lc.ar_no=pln_wge.ar_no and lc.loc_nm=pln_wge.loc_nm order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,lc.loc_nm,pln_wge.wk_id) a,
(select src.rgn_no,src.wk_id,src.pst_factor_mps,src.ngt_factor_mps from (select * from (select lc.wk_id,'1' as rgn_no,NVL(src.pst_factor,0.5) as pst_factor_mps,NVL(src.ngt_factor,1) as ngt_factor_mps from (select perd_desc,wk_id from wk where perd_desc='Month') lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where (wk_id,rgn_no) in (select wk_id,max(rgn_no) as rgn_no from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where wk_id in (select wk_id from wk where perd_desc='Month') and rgn_no in (99,1) group by wk_id) order by wk_id,rgn_no) src on lc.wk_id=src.wk_id order by lc.wk_id,src.rgn_no) r1 UNION ALL select * from (select lc.wk_id,'2' as rgn_no,NVL(src.pst_factor,0.5) as pst_factor_mps,NVL(src.ngt_factor,1) as ngt_factor_mps from (select perd_desc,wk_id from wk where perd_desc='Month') lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where (wk_id,rgn_no) in (select wk_id,max(rgn_no) as rgn_no from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where wk_id in (select wk_id from wk where perd_desc='Month') and rgn_no in (99,2) group by wk_id) order by wk_id,rgn_no) src on lc.wk_id=src.wk_id order by lc.wk_id,src.rgn_no) r2 UNION ALL select * from (select lc.wk_id,'3' as rgn_no,NVL(src.pst_factor,0.5) as pst_factor_mps,NVL(src.ngt_factor,1) as ngt_factor_mps from (select perd_desc,wk_id from wk where perd_desc='Month') lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where (wk_id,rgn_no) in (select wk_id,max(rgn_no) as rgn_no from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where wk_id in (select wk_id from wk where perd_desc='Month') and rgn_no in (99,3) group by wk_id) order by wk_id,rgn_no) src on lc.wk_id=src.wk_id order by lc.wk_id,src.rgn_no) r3 UNION ALL select * from (select lc.wk_id,'4' as rgn_no,NVL(src.pst_factor,0.5) as pst_factor_mps,NVL(src.ngt_factor,1) as ngt_factor_mps from (select perd_desc,wk_id from wk where perd_desc='Month') lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where (wk_id,rgn_no) in (select wk_id,max(rgn_no) as rgn_no from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where wk_id in (select wk_id from wk where perd_desc='Month') and rgn_no in (99,4) group by wk_id) order by wk_id,rgn_no) src on lc.wk_id=src.wk_id order by lc.wk_id,src.rgn_no) r4 UNION ALL select * from (select lc.wk_id,'5' as rgn_no,NVL(src.pst_factor,0.5) as pst_factor_mps,NVL(src.ngt_factor,1) as ngt_factor_mps from (select perd_desc,wk_id from wk where perd_desc='Month') lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where (wk_id,rgn_no) in (select wk_id,max(rgn_no) as rgn_no from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where wk_id in (select wk_id from wk where perd_desc='Month') and rgn_no in (99,5) group by wk_id) order by wk_id,rgn_no) src on lc.wk_id=src.wk_id order by lc.wk_id,src.rgn_no) r5 UNION ALL select * from (select distinct c.wk_id, '90' as rgn_no,0.5 as pst_factor_mps,1 as ngt_factor_mps from wk c where /*b.rgn_no in (5) and*/ c.perd_desc in ('Month')) r90) src order by src.rgn_no,src.wk_id) b,
(select lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,lc.loc_nm,bdgt_wge_pct.wk_id, bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_WGE_MPS,bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_SLS_MPS,bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_WGE_PCT_MPS from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_nm from loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_nm) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.div_no,h.rgn_no,h.zone_no,h.ar_no,h.loc_nm,h.wk_id, NVL(ROUND(h.bdgt_wage_mnth_str,0),0) as BDGT_WGE_MPS,NVL(ROUND(i.bdgt_sls_mnth_str,0),0) as BDGT_SLS_MPS, case when NVL(h.bdgt_wage_mnth_str,0)=0 and NVL(i.bdgt_sls_mnth_str,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(h.bdgt_wage_mnth_str,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(i.bdgt_sls_mnth_str,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((h.bdgt_wage_mnth_str / i.bdgt_sls_mnth_str)*100,2) end as BDGT_WGE_PCT_MPS from (select g.div_no,g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no,g.loc_nm,f.perd_desc,f.wk_id,NVL(g.bdgt_wages_mnth_str,0) as bdgt_wage_mnth_str from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,C.loc_no,c.loc_nm,C.perd_desc,c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(BDGT_WAGE),0) as BDGT_WAGES_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id, ROUND(sum(bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' ) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,c.perd_desc,C.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,c.wk_id) g on f.perd_desc=g.perd_desc and f.wk_id=g.wk_id order by g.div_no,g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no,g.loc_nm,f.wk_id) h INNER JOIN (select g.div_no,g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no,g.loc_nm,f.perd_desc,f.wk_id,NVL(g.BDGT_SALES_MNTH_STR,0) as BDGT_SLS_MNTH_STR from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,C.loc_no,c.loc_nm,C.perd_desc,c.wk_id,ROUND(sum(BDGT_SALES),0) as BDGT_SALES_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id, ROUND(sum(bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SALES, sum(bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and a.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' ) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,c.perd_desc,C.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,c.wk_id) g on f.perd_desc=g.perd_desc and f.wk_id=g.wk_id order by g.div_no,g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no,g.loc_nm,f.wk_id) i on h.div_no=i.div_no and h.rgn_no=i.rgn_no and h.zone_no=i.zone_no and h.ar_no=i.ar_no and h.loc_nm=i.loc_nm and h.perd_desc=i.perd_desc and h.wk_id=i.wk_id order by h.div_no,h.rgn_no,h.zone_no,h.ar_no,h.loc_nm,h.wk_id) bdgt_wge_pct on lc.div_no=bdgt_wge_pct.div_no and lc.rgn_no=bdgt_wge_pct.rgn_no and lc.zone_no=bdgt_wge_pct.zone_no and lc.ar_no=bdgt_wge_pct.ar_no and lc.loc_nm=bdgt_wge_pct.loc_nm order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,lc.loc_nm,bdgt_wge_pct.wk_id) c,
(select lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,lc.loc_nm,pln_sls.wk_id,pln_sls.PLN_SLS_MPS from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_nm from loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_nm) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,f.wk_id,NVL(e.PLAN_SALES,0) as PLN_SLS_MPS from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,round(sum(a.mgr_wky_sls),0) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,wk b, loc c where a.div_no=c.div_no and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' ) and a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,Round(sum(gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,wk b, loc c where a.div_no=c.div_no and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' ) and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select loc_no,wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln where div_no='Division' and loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' ) and wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month')) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.perd_desc=e.perd_desc and f.wk_id=e.wk_id order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,f.wk_id) pln_sls on lc.div_no=pln_sls.div_no and lc.rgn_no=pln_sls.rgn_no and lc.zone_no=pln_sls.zone_no and lc.ar_no=pln_sls.ar_no and lc.loc_nm=pln_sls.loc_nm order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,lc.loc_nm,pln_sls.wk_id) d
where a.div_no=c.div_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and c.div_no=d.div_no and a.rgn_no=c.rgn_no and a.rgn_no=d.rgn_no and c.rgn_no=d.rgn_no and a.rgn_no=b.rgn_no and a.zone_no=c.zone_no and a.zone_no=d.zone_no and c.zone_no=d.zone_no and a.ar_no=c.ar_no and a.ar_no=d.ar_no and c.ar_no=d.ar_no and a.loc_nm=c.loc_nm and a.loc_nm=d.loc_nm and c.loc_nm=d.loc_nm and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and c.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.wk_id=b.wk_id order by a.div_no,a.rgn_no,a.zone_no,a.ar_no,a.loc_nm,a.wk_id) src order by src.div_no,src.rgn_no,src.zone_no,src.ar_no,src.loc_nm,src.wk_id) rslt group by rslt.div_no order by rslt.div_no
TCName.PlannedBudgetRateTotal:
select rslt.div_no,NVL(ROUND(sum(rslt.OVERSPENT_BDGT_RATE_MPS),0),0) as OVERSPENT_BDGT_RATE_TOT_MPWG from (select src.div_no,src.rgn_no,src.zone_no,src.ar_no,src.loc_nm,src.wk_id, case when src.PLN_SLS_MPS > src.BDGT_SLS_MPS then NVL(ROUND((src.PLN_WGE_MPS - ((((src.PST_FACTOR_MPS * (src.BDGT_WGE_PCT_MPS/100)) * (src.PLN_SLS_MPS - src.BDGT_SLS_MPS)) + src.BDGT_WGE_MPS))),0),0) When src.PLN_SLS_MPS < src.BDGT_SLS_MPS then NVL(ROUND((src.PLN_WGE_MPS - ((((src.NGT_FACTOR_MPS * (src.BDGT_WGE_PCT_MPS/100)) * (src.PLN_SLS_MPS - src.BDGT_SLS_MPS)) + src.BDGT_WGE_MPS))),0),0) else NVL(ROUND((src.PLN_WGE_MPS - src.BDGT_WGE_MPS),0),0) end as OVERSPENT_BDGT_RATE_MPS from
(select a.div_no,a.rgn_no,a.zone_no,a.ar_no,a.loc_nm,a.wk_id, a.PLN_WGE_MPS,b.pst_factor_MPS,b.ngt_factor_MPS,c.bdgt_wge_pct_MPS,d.PLN_SLS_MPS,c.BDGT_WGE_MPS,C.BDGT_SLS_MPS from
(select lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,lc.loc_nm,pln_wge.wk_id,pln_wge.PLN_WGE_MPS from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_nm from loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_nm,d.wk_id,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' ) and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_nm,d.wk_id order by BASE_COST_MNTH_PLN_STR from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' ) and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20)) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' ) and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_nm,d.wk_id order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_nm,d.wk_id)) e on e.wk_id=f.wk_id order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,f.wk_id) pln_wge on lc.div_no=pln_wge.div_no and lc.rgn_no=pln_wge.rgn_no and lc.zone_no=pln_wge.zone_no and lc.ar_no=pln_wge.ar_no and lc.loc_nm=pln_wge.loc_nm order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,lc.loc_nm,pln_wge.wk_id) a,

a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_no,c.loc_nm,c.perd_desc,C.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,c.wk_id) g on f.perd_desc=g.perd_desc and f.wk_id=g.wk_id order by g.div_no,g.rgn_no,g.zone_no,g.ar_no,g.loc_nm,f.wk_id) i on h.div_no=i.div_no and h.rgn_no=i.rgn_no and h.zone_no=i.zone_no and h.ar_no=i.ar_no and h.loc_nm=i.loc_nm and h.perd_desc=i.perd_desc and h.wk_id=i.wk_id order by h.div_no,h.rgn_no,h.zone_no,h.ar_no,h.loc_nm,h.wk_id) FRCST_wge_pct on lc.div_no=FRCST_wge_pct.div_no and lc.rgn_no=FRCST_wge_pct.rgn_no and lc.zone_no=FRCST_wge_pct.zone_no and lc.ar_no=FRCST_wge_pct.ar_no and lc.loc_nm=FRCST_wge_pct.loc_nm order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,lc.loc_nm,FRCST_wge_pct.wk_id) c,
(select lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,lc.loc_nm,pln_sls.wk_id,pln_sls.PLN_SLS_MPS from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_nm from loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no,loc_nm) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,f.wk_id,NVL(e.PLAN_SALES,0) as PLN_SLS_MPS from (select perd_desc,wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,round(sum(a.mgr_wky_sls),0) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,wk b, loc c where a.div_no=c.div_no and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' ) and a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id) c UNION select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id,Round(sum(gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,wk b, loc c where a.div_no=c.div_no and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' ) and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select loc_no,wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln where div_no='Division' and loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' ) and wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month')) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id) d) e on f.perd_desc=e.perd_desc and f.wk_id=e.wk_id order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,f.wk_id) pln_sls on lc.div_no=pln_sls.div_no and lc.rgn_no=pln_sls.rgn_no and lc.zone_no=pln_sls.zone_no and lc.ar_no=pln_sls.ar_no and lc.loc_nm=pln_sls.loc_nm order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,lc.loc_nm,pln_sls.wk_id) d
where a.div_no=c.div_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and c.div_no=d.div_no and a.rgn_no=c.rgn_no and a.rgn_no=d.rgn_no and c.rgn_no=d.rgn_no and a.rgn_no=b.rgn_no and a.zone_no=c.zone_no and a.zone_no=d.zone_no and c.zone_no=d.zone_no and a.ar_no=c.ar_no and a.ar_no=d.ar_no and c.ar_no=d.ar_no and a.loc_nm=c.loc_nm and a.loc_nm=d.loc_nm and c.loc_nm=d.loc_nm and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and c.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.wk_id=b.wk_id order by a.div_no,a.rgn_no,a.zone_no,a.ar_no,a.loc_nm,a.wk_id) src order by src.div_no,src.rgn_no,src.zone_no,src.ar_no,src.loc_nm,src.wk_id) rslt group by rslt.div_no order by rslt.div_no

TCName.name: PlannedBDGTRate_CurrentMonth
TCName.PositiveFactorTotal: select PST_FACTOR_MPS from (select lc.wk_id,NVL(src.pst_factor,0.5) as PST_FACTOR_MPS,NVL(src.ngt_factor,1) as NGT_FACTOR_MPS from (select perd_desc,wk_id from wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where (wk_id,rgn_no) in (select wk_id,max(rgn_no) as rgn_no from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where wk_id in (select wk_id from wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and rgn_no in (99) group by wk_id) order by wk_id,rgn_no) src on lc.wk_id=src.wk_id order by lc.wk_id,src.rgn_no) order by wk_id
TCName.NegativeFactorTotal: select NGT_FACTOR_MPS from (select lc.wk_id,NVL(src.pst_factor,0.5) as PST_FACTOR_MPS,NVL(src.ngt_factor,1) as NGT_FACTOR_MPS from (select perd_desc,wk_id from wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where (wk_id,rgn_no) in (select wk_id,max(rgn_no) as rgn_no from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where wk_id in (select wk_id from wk where perd_desc in ('Month')) and rgn_no in (99) group by wk_id) order by wk_id,rgn_no) src on lc.wk_id=src.wk_id order by lc.wk_id,src.rgn_no) order by wk_id

TCName.name: LYWagesPercentage_CurrentMonth
TCName.LYWagesPercentageTotal: select actl_wge_ly.div_no, case when NVL(actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_MPBU,0)=0 and NVL(actl_sls_ly.ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_MPBU,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_MPBU,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_sls_ly.ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_MPBU,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_MPBU / actl_sls_ly.ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_MPBU)*100,2) end as LY_WAGE_PRCNT_TOT_MPBU from (select V.div_no,sum(V.ACTL_WAGE_MPBU) as ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,T.rgn_no,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPBU from (select distinct div_no,rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(ACTL_WAGE),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MNTH_STR,sum(ACTL_HRS) as ACTL_HRS_MNTH_STR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE,sum(actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc in ('LYMnth')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no!=20 group by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc, a.wk_id order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.wk_id) C group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.rgn_no=U.rgn_no order by T.rgn_no) V group by V.div_no order by V.div_no) actl_wge_ly, (select J.div_no,SUM(J.ACTL_SLS_MPBU) as ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,T.rgn_no,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no,rgn_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select J.rgn_no,j.perd_desc,J.ACTL_SALES from (select S.perd_desc,s.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(S.ACTL_SALES),0) as ACTL_SALES from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id, sum(a.actl_sls) as ACTL_SALES from WW_WLP.DLY_SLS a,WW_WLP.WK b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.PERD_DESC in ('LYMnth') and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.div_no = 3 and a.Dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,b.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.wk_id) S group by S.perd_desc,s.rgn_no order by s.rgn_no) J) U on T.rgn_no=U.rgn_no order by T.rgn_no) J group by J.div_no order by div_no) actl_sls_ly where actl_wge_ly.div_no=actl_sls_ly.div_no order by actl_wge_ly.div_no
